solution_line_template: If the blue car can travel at {blue_car_speed} mph, then the green one can travel at {multiplier_green_from_blue}*{blue_car_speed}=<<{multiplier_green_from_blue}*{blue_car_speed}={green_car_speed}>>{green_car_speed} mph
If the green car can travel at {green_car_speed} mph, then the red can travel at {multiplier_red_from_green}*{green_car_speed}={red_car_speed} mph
